column2: text
Collect all the cooking ingredients.
The Great Culinary Quest
The Halfling ruling body, the General Moot decrees an ingredient must be collected.
Ingredient Hunt: The Dark Lands
Tales of a hitherto unseen cooking ingredient from Lustria have reached the Moot. And you can actually survive eating it! Procure it at all cost!
Ingredient Hunt: Lustria
There is an ingredient to be found in the land of the moody elves. Onwards!
Ingredient Hunt: Naggaroth
The Grand Cauldron bubbles, but the broth remains undone for weeks. A special ingredient is required! Raid the North and empty their pantries!
Ingredient Hunt: Norsca
An ingredient under our very noses! We must find a use for it in our kitchens!
Ingredient Hunt: The Old World
Below the lands of bones and sand (not useful) there is a new cooking ingredient (useful)! For the Moot!
Ingredient Hunt: Southlands
We must sail into the West! And return with new cooking ingredients!
Ingredient Hunt: Ulthuan
Move a scouting force (10 units max) to the region below and enter forage stance once there.
Move a fighting force (15 units max) to the region below and enter forage stance once there.
Move an army (20 units max) to the region below and enter forage stance once there.
You have discovered a new ingredient! The whole of Moot erupts in impromptu festivities (that would have happend anyway, to be fair)!
A New Ingredient
Cooking Ingredient Battle
As luck would have it, the intrepid halfling heroes will have to fight a battle for the cooking ingredient!
Request a time extension||Extend the time until this mission expires.

The brigands scatter before the approaching Halflings and you gather the ingredients. But at next camp the army gets hungry and eats all the ingredients you're collected! Next time bring a smaller force with you!
Army Too Large
